thread.title: New footage shows mystery green flash of light appear in sky leaving hundreds of residents baffled
thread.title_full: New footage shows mystery green flash of light appear in sky leaving hundreds of residents baffled

author: Natalie Evans
title: New footage shows mystery green flash of light appear in sky leaving hundreds of residents baffled
text:
New footage shows mystery green flash of light appear in sky leaving hundreds of residents baffled There were more than 350 sightings of the bizarre green fireball across Illinois, Wisconsin and neighbouring states Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Illinois cops spot huge green meteor on dashcam Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
New footage has emerged showing a mysterious green flash which appeared in the early hours of the morning, baffling nearby residents. 
The light was captured on police dashcam on in Lisle, Illinois, in the early hours of Monday morning. 
The fireball streaks from nowhere in the sky and suddenly explodes in a dazzling green flash of light before vanishing. 
The celestial show was also spotted over Lake Michigan , where several sightings were reported between 1:30 and 3am. Read More The fireball appeared from nowhere in the night sky (Photo: Illinois Police Department) It exploded turning the whole sky green (Photo: Illinois Police Department) The bizarre light was caught on police dashcam (Photo: Illinois Police Department) 
Video also appeared from residents across Wisconsin who had caught the moment on camera. 
The American Meteor Society reported more than 350 sightings of the fireball in the neighbouring states. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
